Submitter Information: U.S. Army Medical Materiel Development Activity
Regulation Name(s): Reagents for Detection of Specific Novel Influenza A Viruses
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Reverse transcriptase real-time polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Methodologies: Qualitative nucleic acid detection and subtyping
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for JBAIDS Influenza A Subtyping Kit using rRT-PCR on JBAIDS instrument for qualitative detection and differentiation of Influenza A subtypes
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative in vitro detection and differentiation of seasonal Influenza A/H1, Influenza A/H3, and 2009 H1N1 Influenza nucleic acids from nasopharyngeal swab and wash specimens, for use in designated DoD labs equipped with JBAIDS instruments
